data.comment: The match has started at Roazhon Park.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rennes.
In the minute 3, In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
In the minute 4, Mbaye Niang (Rennes) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Clement Turpin awards Marseille a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Rennes in the half of Marseille.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Marseille.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Marseille are in shooting range from this free kick.
Leonardo Balerdi (Marseille) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
In the minute 10, Free kick Marseille.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Pape Alassane Gueye is booked for the away team.
In the minute 12, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
In Rennes Marseille attack through Dario Benedetto. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 14, Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille at Roazhon Park.
Clement Turpin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Marseille.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jordan Amavi for Marseille who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Rennes to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 20, Yuto Nagatomo (Marseille) has replaced the possibly injured Jordan Amavi at Roazhon Park.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 23, In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marseille take a 0-1 lead thanks to Pape Alassane Gueye.
Dimitri Payet instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 26, Free kick Marseille.
Throw-in Rennes.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Hamari Traore is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Marseille.
In the minute 31, Hamari Traore is back on his feet again.
Dimitri Payet for Marseille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
In the minute 32, Faitout Maouassa of Rennes smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 34, In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Marseille.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pape Alassane Gueye (Marseille) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 39, Clement Turpin awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Marseille.
Rennes's Eduardo Camavinga breaks free at Roazhon Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Marseille at Roazhon Park.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Roazhon Park, Leonardo Balerdi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 43, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Marseille.
Rennes have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Clement Turpin signals a Marseille throw-in in Rennes's half.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Dario Benedetto with Valere Germain. This is the second substitution made today by Andre Villas-Boas.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 48, Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
Martin Terrier returns to the field for Rennes after picking up a slight injury.
The match at Roazhon Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Martin Terrier, who is down injured.
In the minute 50, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Throw-in Marseille.
Clement Turpin signals a throw-in for Rennes, close to Marseille's area.
In the minute 53, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Rennes.
In the minute 58, Florian Thauvin is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Marseille.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
In the minute 61, Marseille are coming forward and Dimitri Payet gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rennes.
Florian Thauvin for Marseille is back on the field again.
In the minute 61, Clement Turpin signals a Rennes throw-in in Marseille's half.
Adrien Hunou is replacing Clement Grenier for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Julien Stephan is making the team's second substitution at Roazhon Park with Adrien Truffert replacing Faitout Maouassa.
In the minute 63, Hamari Traore equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Jeremy Doku with an assist there.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 65, Clement Turpin awards Marseille a goal kick.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Rennes in Rennes.
In the minute 67, Rennes to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Rennes have a dangerous throw-in.
Rennes's Martin Terrier is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Adrien Hunou gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rennes.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Goal kick for Marseille at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 71, It seems as if Florian Thauvin is unable to continue. Mickael Cuisance replaces him for the away team.
Marseille make their fourth substitution with Kevin Strootman replacing Dimitri Payet.
In the minute 72, Free kick Marseille.
Adrien Hunou (Rennes) has received a yellow card from Clement Turpin.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Georginio Rutter is on a sub for Martin Terrier for Rennes.
In the minute 73, Julien Stephan (Rennes) is making a fourth substitution, with Benjamin Bourigeaud replacing Eduardo Camavinga.
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Marseille.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 77, Rennes have a goal kick.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Rennes push forward at Roazhon Park and Benjamin Bourigeaud gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Marseille defence.
In the minute 78, Rennes's Steven Nzonzi misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
In the minute 80, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Mickael Cuisance (Marseille) has received a first yellow card.
Rennes are whistled for offside.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Rennes close to the penalty box.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! Rennes have got their heads in front thanks to a Adrien Hunou strike.
In the minute 83, That's a fine assist from Nayef Aguerd.
Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
Clement Turpin awards the away team a throw-in.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
In the minute 86, Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a fifth substitution, with Marley Ake replacing Boubacar Kamara.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Rennes.
In the minute 89, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Rennes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Clement Turpin signals a Marseille throw-in in Rennes's half.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Rennes.
Clement Turpin awards the home team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
The home team replace Mbaye Niang with James Lea Siliki.
